set_davis_time.name: Set Davis Time
set_davis_time.description: Set the time of the Davis weather station

get_davis_time.name: Get Davis Time
get_davis_time.description: Get the time of the Davis weather station

get_raw_data.name: Get Raw Data
get_raw_data.description: Get the raw, unprocessed data from the last fetch

get_info.name: Get Information
get_info.description: Get information about firmware and diagnostics

rain_clicks.name: Rain Clicks
rain_clicks.description: Rain in clicks (depending on setup one click = 0.01" or 0.2mm)

set_archive_period.name: Set Archive Period
set_archive_period.description: Set the archive period in minutes. WARNING: All stored archive data will be erased!!!

set_rain_collector.name: Set rain collector
set_rain_collector.description: Set the rain collector (0.01", 0.2 mm or 0.1 mm)
